column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First time trying deep dish pizza a couple of years ago. We were skeptical at first
column3: we were amazed!! This is some of the best pizza we've ever had. We get the Lou
column4: and it is worth every single bite! The sauce
column5: cheese and buttery crust are all perfect! Now
column7: we plan to have Lou Malnati's as our first meal
column8: and this gives us a few days to have it again as our last meal. I've seen people walk in with their luggage straight from the airport. It is that good!
